name: Jedora Remix VM
short_description: A Virtual Machine Linux appliance (for Virtualbox). This Fedora Remix puts emphasis on Java based applications. Includes OpenOffice.org, OpenJDK, browser plug-ins (IcedTea), and popular Java based applications like Azureus/Vuze, jEdit, and more.
